title: My Old Uncle Is Still A Player
itunes:title: My Old Uncle Is Still A Player
description:
Dear Auntie Shirley and Uncle Steve, I have a problem with my real family members, so I want to be your niece instead. Here’s my problem… I’m a 28 year old woman that was raised by three uncles that were like father figures to me and I’m very close to all of them. One of my uncles is getting on my last nerve though. I’m really close with his daughter, my cousin, and she’s sick of him too. We grew up staying at grandma’s house and we watched my uncles have lots of different women around the house.............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Auntie Shirley and Uncle Steve, I have a problem with my real family members, so I want to be your niece instead. Here’s my problem… I’m a 28 year old woman that was raised by three uncles that were like father figures to me and I’m very close to all of them. One of my uncles is getting on my last nerve though. I’m really close with his daughter, my cousin, and she’s sick of him too. We grew up staying at grandma’s house and we watched my uncles have lots of different women around the house.............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
